stories.original_headline: Next gen cancer drug shows surprising anti aging power
stories.original_summary: A next-generation drug tested in yeast was found to extend lifespan and slow aging by influencing a major growth-control pathway. Researchers also uncovered an unexpected role for agmatinases, enzymes that help keep this pathway in balance. Diet and gut microbes may affect aging more than expected b
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Elixir That Wards Off Age's Grip!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has concocted a wondrous new elixir. Tested on magical fungi, this potion appears to prolong life and slow the creeping effects of old age. They believe certain mystical essences and the balance of inner spirits may hold the key to eternal youth.

stories.original_headline: Scientists reveal a powerful heart boost hidden in everyday foods
stories.original_summary: Regular consumption of polyphenol-rich foods like tea, coffee, berries, nuts, and whole grains may significantly support long-term heart health. stories.fantasy_headline: Healers Uncover Heart's Vigor in Common Provisions!
stories.fantasy_story: Wise Healers have discovered a secret to a strong heart within everyday fare. Eating plenty of enchanted berries, hearty nuts, and wholesome grains helps maintain one's inner humors. Those who partake consistently are blessed with robust health and long lives.

stories.fantasy_headline: A Grand Scroll of Gifts for the Winter Solstice!
stories.fantasy_story: The Winter Solstice celebrations always arrive swifter than a fleeing pixy. To aid frantic villagers seeking gifts, the Merchants' Guild has prepared a wondrous scroll. It lists enchanted trinkets and useful wares to bring joy without stress.
